name: Toddler
description: Preschool for children between the ages of 18 and 36 months. Children paint, cook, water the garden, sing songs with friends and play with materials that develop fine and gross motor coordination.
fullDescription: Preschool for children between the ages of 18 and 36 months. Children paint, cook, water the garden, sing songs with friends and play with materials that develop fine and gross motor coordination.
whatTheyOffer: Preschool for children between the ages of 18 and 36 months. Children paint, cook, water the garden, sing songs with friends and play with materials that develop fine and gross motor coordination.
howToGetIt: To apply follow the multi-step process outlined here.
cost: This is a fee based service with tuition assistance available.
agency: The Dahlia Schools of San Francisco
